thread.section_title: Sheenco Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sheenco Travel | sheencotravel.com
thread.title: Kathleen Mitu
thread.title_full: Sheenco Travel reviewed by Kathleen Mitu

author: Kathleen Mitu
title: Kathleen Mitu
text: My colleagues and I have used Sheenco for very memorable vacations. They are excellent to deal with, and even though they are in Ireland, easy to reach from North America. Their trip proposals are just beautiful, and easily convince clients to book. They can modify an itinerary endlessly, until it's absolutely perfect.
